SELECT dpm.id,dpm.user_id as usrId,dpm.power,dpm.project_id as projectId, dpm.create_time as createTime,dpm.update_time as updateTime, dp.name as projectName,dp.creator as projectCreator,du.name as projectCreatorName FROM d_power_mapping dpm LEFT JOIN d_project dp ON dpm.project_id = dp.id LEFT JOIN d_user du ON dp.creator = du.id where dpm.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and dpm.power = 0 or dpm.power = 2;

SELECT dpm.id,dpm.user_id,dpm.power,dpm.project_id as projectId,dpm.create_time as createTime, dpm.update_time as updateTime,dp.name as projectName,dp.creator as projectCreator,du.name as userName FROM d_power_mapping dpm LEFT JOIN d_project dp ON dpm.project_id = dp.id LEFT JOIN d_user du ON dpm.user_id = du.id where dp.creator = 10001 and dpm.power = 0 ;

SELECT dp.id AS projectId, dp.name AS projectName,dp.creator,dp.model,dp.ui,dp.web, du.name AS creatorName,dp.create_time AS createTime,dp.update_time AS updateTime FROM d_power_mapping dpm LEFT JOIN d_project dp ON dpm.project_id = dp.id LEFT JOIN d_user du ON dp.creator = du.id WHERE dpm.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND power = 1;
